text: Intars Spalviņš (born 20 December 1980) is a Latvian cross-country skier. He competed in the men's sprint event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Latvian male cross- country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Latvia Category:Cross- country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:People from Jelgava
title: Intars Spalviņš
